meanings.definition: A set of clothes worn together, especially for a particular occasion or purpose.
meanings.sent1: She picked out a stylish outfits for the party.
meanings.sent3: The outfits at the costume party were hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His outfits were like a rainbow of colors.
meanings.sent5: The outfits on display were stunning.

meanings.definition: A group or organization, especially one involved in a particular activity or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The rescue outfits arrived just in time.
meanings.sent3: The outfits of volunteers made a big impact.
meanings.sent4: Their outfits were a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The outfits collaborated effectively on the project.
